main(String[]) - Static method in class project.jsimon.JSimonRace
The main method calls the launch method, which creates an instance of the class and calls the start method with a new stage.
missTurnAction() - Method in class project.jsimon.Board
This method updates the game state by setting the current player's miss turn flag to true and reducing their score by 5 points.

move(Player, String) - Method in class project.jsimon.Move
The move method is used to move a player object in a particular direction on a grid.
Move - Class in project.jsimon
The Move class represents a player's movement on a board in a game.
Move() - Constructor for class project.jsimon.Move
 
moveBackward(int, int) - Method in class project.jsimon.Move
This method moves a player backward on the game board.
moveForward(int, int) - Method in class project.jsimon.Move
This method moves the object on which it is called forward by modifying its x and y position coordinates.

The moveLeftAction method handles the logic for moving a player to the left in some kind of game.

moveSideLeft(int, int) - Method in class project.jsimon.Move
This method moves a player to the left by 60 units.
moveSideRight(int, int) - Method in class project.jsimon.Move
